ayas.text: alif lām rā ۚ kitābun uḥkimat āyātuhu thumma fuṣṣilat min ladun ḥakīmin khabīr
allā ta`budū illallāh ۚ innanī lakum minhu nadhīrun wabashīr
wa-anis-taghfirū rabbakum thumma tūbū ilayhi yumatti`kum matā`an ḥasanan ilā ajalin musamman wayu-ti kulla dhī faḍlin faḍlah ۖ wa in tawallaw fa-innī akhāfu `alaykum `adhāba yawmin kabīr
ilallāhi marji`ukum ۖ wahuwa `alā kulli shay-in qadīr
alā innahum yathnūna ṣudūrahum liyastakhfū minh ۚ alā ḥīna yastaghshūna thiyābahum ya`lamu mā yusirrūna wa mā yu`linūn ۚ innahu `alīmun bidhātiṣ ṣudūr
wa mā min dābbatin fil-arḍi illā `alallāhi rizquhā waya`lamu mustaqarrahā wa mustawda`ahā ۚ kullun fī kitābin mubīn

wahuwal ladhī khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa fī sittati ayyāmin wakāna `arshuhu `alal-mā-i liyabluwakum ayyukum aḥsanu `amalā ۗ wala-in qulta innakum mab`ūthūna min ba`dil mawti layaqūlannal ladhīna kafarū in hādhā illā siḥrun mubīn
wala-in akhharnā `anhumul `adhāba ilā ummatim ma`dūdatin layaqūlunna mā yaḥbisuh ۗ alā yawma ya-tīhim laysa maṣrūfan `anhum waḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihi yastahzi-ūn
wala-in adhaqnal-insāna minnā raḥmatan thumma naza`nāhā minhu innahu laya-ūsun kafūr
wala-in adhaqnāhu na`mā-a ba`da ḍarrā-a massat-hu layaqūlanna dhahabas sayyi-ātu `annī ۚ innahu lafariḥun fakhūr
illal ladhīna ṣabarū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti ulā-ika lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabīr
fala`allaka tārikun ba`ḍa mā yūḥā ilayka waḍā-iqun bihi ṣadruka an yaqūlū lawlā unzila `alayhi kanzun aw jā-a ma`ahu malak ۚ innamā anta nadhīr ۚ wallāhu `alā kulli shay-in wakīl
am yaqūlūnaf-tarāh ۖ qul fa-tū bi`ashri suwarin mithlihi muftarayātin wad`ū manis-taṭa`tum min dūnillāhi in kuntum ṣādiqīn
fa-illam yastajībū lakum fa`lamū annamā unzila bi`il-millāhi wa-an lā ilāha illā huw ۖ fahal antum muslimūn
man kāna yurīdul ḥayātad dunyā wazīnatahā nuwaffi ilayhim a`mālahum fīhā wahum fīhā lā yubkhasūn
ulā-ikal ladhīna laysa lahum fil-ākhirati illan nār ۖ waḥabiṭa mā ṣana`ū fīhā wabāṭilun mā kānū ya`malūn

afaman kāna `alā bayyinatim min rabbihi wayatlūhu shāhidun minhu wa min qablihi kitābu mūsā imāman waraḥmah ۚ ulā-ika yu-minūna bih ۚ wa man yakfur bihi minal-aḥzābi fan nāru maw`iduh ۚ falā taku fī miryatim minh ۚ innahul ḥaqqu min rabbika walākinna aktharan nāsi lā yu-minūn
wa man aẓlamu mimmanif-tarā `alallāhi kadhibā ۚ ulā-ika yu`raḍūna `alā rabbihim wayaqūlul-ash-hādu hā-ulā-il ladhīna kadhabū `alā rabbihim ۚ alā la`natullāhi `alaẓ ẓālimīn
alladhīna yaṣuddūna `an sabīlillāhi wayabghūnahā `iwajan wahum bil-ākhirati hum kāfirūn
ulā-ika lam yakūnū mu`jizīna fil-arḍi wa mā kāna lahum min dūnillāhi min awliyā-a ۘ yuḍā`afu lahumul `adhāb ۚ mā kānū yastaṭī`ūnas sam`a wa mā kānū yubṣirūn
ulā-ikal ladhīna khasirū anfusahum waḍalla `anhum mā kānū yaftarūn
lā jarama annahum fil-ākhirati humul-akhsarūn
innal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti wa-akhbatū ilā rabbihim ulā-ika aṣ-ḥābul jannah ۖ hum fīhā khālidūn
mathalul farīqayni kal-a`mā wal-aṣammi wal baṣīri was samī` ۚ hal yastawiyāni mathalā ۚ afalā tadhakkarūn
walaqad arsalnā nūḥan ilā qawmihi innī lakum nadhīrun mubīn
an lā ta`budū illallāh ۖ innī akhāfu `alaykum `adhāba yawmin alīm

faqālal-mala-ul ladhīna kafarū min qawmihi mā narāka illā basharan mithlanā wa mā narākat-taba`aka illal ladhīna hum arādhilunā bādiyar ra-yi wa mā narā lakum `alaynā min faḍlin bal naẓunnukum kādhibīn
qāla yāqawmi ara aytum in kuntu `alā bayyinatim min rabbī wa-ātānī raḥmatan min `indihi fa`ummiyat `alaykum anulzimukumūhā wa-antum lahā kārihūn
wayāqawmi lā as-alukum `alayhi mālā ۖ in ajriya illā `alallāh ۚ wa mā ana biṭāridil ladhīna āmanū ۚ innahum mulāqū rabbihim walākinnī arākum qawman tajhalūn
wayāqawmi man yanṣurunī minallāhi in ṭaradtuhum ۚ afalā tadhakkarūn

walā aqūlu lakum `indī khazā-inullāhi walā a`lamul ghayba walā aqūlu innī malakun walā aqūlu lilladhīna tazdarī a`yunukum lan yu-tiyahumullāhu khayrā ۖ allāhu a`lamu bimā fī anfusihim ۖ innī idhal laminaẓ ẓālimīn
qālū yānūḥu qad jādaltanā fa-aktharta jidālanā fa-tinā bimā ta`idunā in kunta minaṣ ṣādiqīn
qāla innamā ya-tīkum bihillāhu in shā-a wa mā antum bimu`jizīn
walā yanfa`ukum nuṣ-ḥī in aradtu an anṣaḥa lakum in kānallāhu yurīdu an yughwiyakum ۚ huwa rabbukum wa ilayhi turja`ūn
am yaqūlūnaf-tarāh ۖ qul inif-taraytuhu fa`alayya ijrāmī wa-ana barī-un mimmā tujrimūn
wa-ūḥiya ilā nūḥin annahu lan yu-mina min qawmika illā man qad āmana falā tabta-is bimā kānū yaf`alūn
waṣna`il fulka bi-a`yuninā wawaḥyinā walā tukhāṭibnī fil ladhīna ẓalamū ۚ innahum mughraqūn
wayaṣna`ul fulka wakullamā marra `alayhi mala-un min qawmihi sakhirū minh ۚ qāla in taskharū minnā fa-innā naskharu minkum kamā taskharūn
fasawfa ta`lamūna man ya-tīhi `adhābun yukhzīhi wayaḥillu `alayhi `adhābun muqīm
ḥattā idhā jā-a amrunā wafārat tannūru qulnaḥ-mil fīhā min kullin zawjaynith-nayni wa-ahlaka illā man sabaqa `alayhil qawlu wa man āman ۚ wa mā āmana ma`ahu illā qalīl
waqālar-kabū fīhā bismillāhi majrehā wa mursāhā ۚ inna rabbī laghafūrun raḥīm
wahiya tajrī bihim fī mawjin kal jibāli wanādā nūḥunib-nahu wakāna fī ma`ziliy yābunayyar-kab ma`anā walā takun ma`al kāfirīn
qāla sa-āwy ilā jabaliy ya`ṣimunī minal mā-i ۚ qāla lā `āṣimal yawma min amrillāhi illā man raḥim ۚ waḥāla baynahumal mawju fakāna minal mughraqīn
waqīla yā-arḍub-la`ī mā-aki wayāsamā-u aqli`ī waghīḍal mā-u waquḍiyal-amru wastawat `alal-jūdiyy ۖ waqīla bu`dal lilqawmiẓ ẓālimīn
wanādā nūḥun rabbahu faqāla rabbi innab-nī min ahlī wa inna wa`dakal ḥaqqu wa-anta aḥkamul ḥākimīn
qāla yānūḥu innahu laysa min ahlik ۖ innahu `amalun ghayru ṣāliḥ ۖ falā tas-alni mā laysa laka bihi `il-m ۖ innī a`iẓuka an takūna minal jāhilīn
qāla rabbi innī a`ūdhu bika an as-alaka mā laysa lī bihi `il-m ۖ wa illā taghfir lī watarḥamnī akun minal khāsirīn
qīla yānūḥuh-biṭ bisalāmin minnā wabarakātin `alayka wa`alā umamin mimman ma`ak ۚ wa-umamun sanumatti`uhum thumma yamassuhum minnā `adhābun alīm
tilka min anbā-il ghaybi nūḥīhā ilayk ۖ mā kunta ta`lamuhā anta walā qawmuka min qabli hādhā ۖ faṣbir ۖ innal `āqibata lil-muttaqīn
wa ilā `ādin akhāhum hūdā ۚ qāla yāqawmi'-budullāha mā lakum min ilāhin ghayruh ۖ in antum illā muftarūn
yāqawmi lā as-alukum `alayhi ajrā ۖ in ajriya illā `alal ladhī faṭaranī ۚ afalā ta`qilūn
wayāqawmis-taghfirū rabbakum thumma tūbū ilayhi yursilis samā-a `alaykum midrāran wayazidkum quwwatan ilā quwwatikum walā tatawallaw mujrimīn
qālū yāhūdu mā ji-tanā bibayyinatin wa mā naḥnu bitārikī ālihatinā `an qawlika wa mā naḥnu laka bimu-minīn
in naqūlu illa'-tarāka ba`ḍu ālihatinā bisū-ī ۗ qāla innī ush-hidullāha wash-hadū annī barī-un mimmā tushrikūn
min dūnih ۖ fakīdūnī jamī`an thumma lā tunẓirūn
innī tawakkaltu `alallāhi rabbī warabbikum ۚ mā min dābbatin illā huwa ākhidhun bināṣiyatihā ۚ inna rabbī `alā ṣirāṭin mustaqīm
fa-in tawallaw faqad ablaghtukum mā ursiltu bihi ilaykum ۚ wayastakhlifu rabbī qawman ghayrakum walā taḍurrūnahu shay-ā ۚ inna rabbī `alā kulli shay-in ḥafīẓ
walammā jā-a amrunā najjaynā hūdan wal ladhīna āmanū ma`ahu biraḥmatim minnā wanajjaynāhum min `adhābin ghalīẓ
watilka `ād ۖ jaḥadū bi-āyāti rabbihim wa`aṣaw rusulahu wattaba`ū amra kulli jabbārin `anīd
wa-utbi`ū fī hādhihid dunyā la`natan wayawmal qiyāmah ۗ alā inna `ādan kafarū rabbahum ۗ alā bu`dal li`ādin qawmi hūd
wa ilā thamūda akhāhum ṣāliḥā ۚ qāla yāqawmi'-budullāha mā lakum min ilāhin ghayruh ۖ huwa ansha-akum minal-arḍi wasta`marakum fīhā fastaghfirūhu thumma tūbū ilayh ۚ inna rabbī qarībun mujīb
qālū yāṣāliḥu qad kunta fīnā marjuwwan qabla hādhā ۖ atanhānā an na`buda mā ya`budu ābā-unā wa innanā lafī shakkin mimmā tad`ūnā ilayhi murīb
qāla yāqawmi ara aytum in kuntu `alā bayyinatim min rabbī wa-ātānī minhu raḥmatan faman yanṣurunī minallāhi in `aṣaytuh ۖ famā tazīdūnanī ghayra takhsīr
wayāqawmi hādhihi nāqatullāhi lakum āyatan fadharūhā ta-kul fī arḍillāhi walā tamassūhā bisū-in faya-khudhakum `adhābun qarīb
fa`aqarūhā faqāla tamatta`ū fī dārikum thalāthata ayyām ۖ dhālika wa`dun ghayru makdhūb
falammā jā-a amrunā najjaynā ṣāliḥan wal ladhīna āmanū ma`ahu biraḥmatim minnā wa min khizyi yawmi-idh ۗ inna rabbaka huwal qawiyyul `azīz
wa-akhadhal ladhīna ẓalamuṣ ṣayḥatu fa-aṣbaḥū fī diyārihim jāthimīn
ka-an lam yaghnaw fīhā ۗ alā inna thamūda kafarū rabbahum ۗ alā bu`dal lithamūd
walaqad jā-at rusulunā ibrāhīma bil bushrā qālū salāmā ۖ qāla salām ۖ famā labitha an jā-a bi`ijlin ḥanīdh
falammā ra-ā aydiyahum lā taṣilu ilayhi nakirahum wa-awjasa minhum khīfah ۚ qālū lā takhaf innā ursilnā ilā qawmi lūṭ
wamra-atuhu qā-imatun faḍaḥikat fabashharnāhā bi-is-ḥāqa wa min warā-i is-ḥāqa ya`qūb
qālat yāwaylatā a-alidu wa-ana `ajūzun wahādhā ba`lī shaykhā ۖ inna hādhā lashay-un `ajīb
qālū ata`jabīna min amrillāh ۖ raḥmatullāhi wabarakātuhu `alaykum ahlal-bayt ۚ innahu ḥamīdun majīd
falammā dhahaba `an ibrāhīmar raw`u wajā-at hul bushrā yujādilunā fī qawmi lūṭ
inna ibrāhīma laḥalīmun awwāhun munīb
yā-ibrāhīmu a`riḍ `an hādhā ۖ innahu qad jā-a amru rabbik ۖ wa innahum ātīhim `adhābun ghayru mardūd
walammā jā-at rusulunā lūṭan sī-a bihim waḍāqa bihim dhar`an waqāla hādhā yawmun `aṣīb
wajā-ahu qawmuhu yuhra`ūna ilayhi wa min qablu kānū ya`malūnas sayyi-āt ۚ qāla yāqawmi hā-ulā-i banātī hunna aṭ-haru lakum ۖ fattaqullāha walā tukhzūni fī ḍayfī ۖ alaysa minkum rajulun rashīd
qālū laqad `alimta mā lanā fī banātika min ḥaqqin wa innaka lata`lamu mā nurīd
qāla law anna lī bikum quwwatan aw āwy ilā ruknin shadīd

qālū yālūṭu innā rusulu rabbika lan yaṣilū ilayk ۖ fa-asri bi-ahlika biqiṭ`in minal layli walā yaltafit minkum aḥadun illam-ra-atak ۖ innahu muṣībuhā mā aṣābahum ۚ inna maw`idahumuṣ ṣubḥ ۚ alaysaṣ ṣubḥu biqarīb
falammā jā-a amrunā ja`alnā `āliyahā sāfilahā wa-amṭarnā `alayhā ḥijāratan min sijjīlin manḍūd
musawwamatan `inda rabbik ۖ wa mā hiya minaẓ ẓālimīna biba`īd
wa ilā madyana akhāhum shu`aybā ۚ qāla yāqawmi'-budullāha mā lakum min ilāhin ghayruh ۖ walā tanquṣul mikyāla wal mīzān ۚ innī arākum bikhayrin wa innī akhāfu `alaykum `adhāba yawmin muḥīṭ
wayāqawmi awful mikyāla wal mīzāna bil qisṭ ۖ walā tabkhasun nāsa ashyā-ahum walā ta`thaw fil-arḍi mufsidīn
baqiyyatullāhi khayrul lakum in kuntum mu-minīn ۚ wa mā ana `alaykum biḥafīẓ
qālū yāshu`aybu aṣalātuka ta-muruka an natruka mā ya`budu ābā-unā aw an naf`ala fī amwālinā mā nashā-u ۖ innaka la-antal ḥalīmur rashīd

qāla yāqawmi ara aytum in kuntu `alā bayyinatim min rabbī warazaqanī minhu rizqan ḥasanā ۚ wa mā urīdu an ukhālifakum ilā mā anhākum `anh ۚ in urīdu illal-iṣlāḥa mas-taṭa`t ۚ wa mā tawfīqī illā billāh ۚ `alayhi tawakkaltu wa ilayhi unīb
wayāqawmi lā yajrimannakum shiqāqī an yuṣībakum mithlu mā aṣāba qawma nūḥin aw qawma hūdin aw qawma ṣāliḥ ۚ wa mā qawmu lūṭin minkum biba`īd
wastaghfirū rabbakum thumma tūbū ilayh ۚ inna rabbī raḥīmun wadūd
qālū yāshu`aybu mā nafqahu kathīran mimmā taqūlu wa innā lanarāka fīnā ḍa`īfā ۖ walawlā rahṭuka larajamnāk ۖ wa mā anta `alaynā bi`azīz
qāla yāqawmi arahṭī a`azzu `alaykum minallāhi wattakhadhtumūhu warā-akum ẓihriyyā ۖ inna rabbī bimā ta`malūna muḥīṭ
wayāqawmi'-malū `alā makānatikum innī `āmil ۖ sawfa ta`lamūna man ya-tīhi `adhābun yukhzīhi wa man huwa kādhib ۖ wartaqibū innī ma`akum raqīb
walammā jā-a amrunā najjaynā shu`ayban wal ladhīna āmanū ma`ahu biraḥmatim minnā wa-akhadhatil ladhīna ẓalamuṣ ṣayḥatu fa-aṣbaḥū fī diyārihim jāthimīn
ka-an lam yaghnaw fīhā ۗ alā bu`dal limadyana kamā ba`idat thamūd
walaqad arsalnā mūsā bi-āyātinā wasulṭānin mubīn
ilā fir`awna wa mala-ihi fattaba`ū amra fir`awn ۖ wa mā amru fir`awna birashīd
yaqdumu qawmahu yawmal qiyāmati fa-awradahumun nār ۖ wabi-sal wirdul mawrūd
wa-utbi`ū fī hādhihi la`natan wayawmal qiyāmah ۚ bi-sar rifdul marfūd
dhālika min anbā-il qurā naquṣṣuhu `alayk ۖ minhā qā-imun waḥaṣīd
wa mā ẓalamnāhum walākin ẓalamū anfusahum ۖ famā aghnat `anhum ālihatuhumul latī yad`ūna min dūnillāhi min shay-in lammā jā-a amru rabbik ۖ wa mā zādūhum ghayra tatbīb
wakadhālika akhdhu rabbika idhā akhadhal qurā wahiya ẓālimah ۚ inna akhdhahu alīmun shadīd
inna fī dhālika la-āyatan liman khāfa `adhābal-ākhirah ۚ dhālika yawmun majmū`ul lahun nāsu wadhālika yawmun mash-hūd
wa mā nu-akhhiruhu illā li-ajalin ma`dūd
yawma ya-ti lā takallamu nafsun illā bi-idhnih ۚ faminhum shaqiyyun wasa`īd
fa-ammal ladhīna shaqū fafin nāri lahum fīhā zafīrun washahīq
khālidīna fīhā mā dāmatis samāwātu wal-arḍu illā mā shā-a rabbuk ۚ inna rabbaka fa``ālul limā yurīd
wa-ammal ladhīna su`idū fafil jannati khālidīna fīhā mā dāmatis samāwātu wal-arḍu illā mā shā-a rabbuk ۖ `aṭā-an ghayra majdhūdh
falā taku fī miryatim mimmā ya`budu hā-ulā-i ۚ mā ya`budūna illā kamā ya`budu ābā-uhum min qabl ۚ wa innā lamuwaffūhum naṣībahum ghayra manqūṣ
walaqad ātaynā mūsal kitāba fakhtulifa fīh ۚ walawlā kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika laquḍiya baynahum ۚ wa innahum lafī shakkin minhu murīb
wa inna kullal lammā layuwaffiyannahum rabbuka a`mālahum ۚ innahu bimā ya`malūna khabīr
fastaqim kamā umirta wa man tāba ma`aka walā taṭghaw ۚ innahu bimā ta`malūna baṣīr
walā tarkanū ilal ladhīna ẓalamū fatamassakumun nāru wa mā lakum min dūnillāhi min awliyā-a thumma lā tunṣarūn
wa-aqimiṣ ṣalāta ṭarafayin nahāri wazulafan minal layl ۚ innal ḥasanāti yudh-hibnas sayyi-āt ۚ dhālika dhikrā lidhhākirīn
waṣbir fa-innallāha lā yuḍī`u ajral muḥsinīn
falawlā kāna minal qurūni min qablikum ulū baqiyyatin yanhawna `anil fasādi fil-arḍi illā qalīlan mimman anjaynā minhum ۗ wattaba`al ladhīna ẓalamū mā utrifū fīhi wakānū mujrimīn
wa mā kāna rabbuka liyuhlikal qurā biẓul-min wa-ahluhā muṣliḥūn
walaw shā-a rabbuka laja`alan nāsa ummatan wāḥidah ۖ walā yazālūna mukhtalifīn
illā man raḥima rabbuk ۚ walidhālika khalaqahum ۗ watammat kalimatu rabbika la-amla-anna jahannama minal jinnati wan nāsi ajma`īn
wakullan naquṣṣu `alayka min anbā-ir rusuli mā nuthabbitu bihi fu-ādak ۚ wajā-aka fī hādhihil ḥaqqu wa maw`iẓatun wadhikrā lil-mu-minīn
waqul lilladhīna lā yu-minūna'-malū `alā makānatikum innā `āmilūn
wantaẓirū innā muntaẓirūn
walillāhi ghaybus samāwāti wal-arḍi wa ilayhi yurja`ul-amru kulluhu fa`bud-hu watawakkal `alayh ۚ wa mā rabbuka bighāfilin `ammā ta`malūn
